memberdef.argsstring: (PllSource source, uint8_t pllM, uint16_t pllN, uint8_t pllP, uint32_t waitCycles=2048)
memberdef.name: enablePll

parameterdescription.para: Source select for PLL and for plli2s. If you are using HSE you must enable it first (see enableHse()).

Division factor for the main PLL (PLL) and audio PLL (PLLI2S) input clock (with 2 <= pllM <= 63). The software has to set these bits correctly to ensure that frequency of selected source divided by pllM is in ranges from 1 to 2 MHz.

Main PLL (PLL) multiplication factor for VCO (with 64 <= pllN <= 432). The software has to set these bits correctly to ensure that the VCO output frequency is
336 MHz for ST32F4. Core will run at 168 MHz.

listitem.para: 240 MHz for ST32F2. Core will run at 120 MHz.

detaileddescription.para: Set flash latency for CPU frequency and voltage. Does nothing if CPU frequency is too high for the available voltage.

parameterdescription.para: flash latency has been set correctly.
requested frequency too high for voltage.

detaileddescription.para: Reset and Clock Control for STM32 devices.

This class abstracts access to clock settings on the STM32. You need to use this class to enable internal and external clock sources & outputs, set PLL parameters and AHB & APB prescalers. Don't forget to set the flash latencies.
